CHAT.comment: Karen Auerbach and Angela L. Atkinson Duina , Karen Auerbach

MOT starts out by asking if they can go over the book first and then write the letter. After they go over the book , MOT asks Chi what she would like to write. Chi gives an answer , but Mot seems to disregard it. Mot suggests something else and then tells Chi what to write for the rest of the letter. There seems to be a friendly atmosphere. Chi sighs heavily a few times when Mot corrects her writing. Chi seems to have some difficulty with spelling.

u.a: MOT reads <as he is fix> from Chi's letter
as Mot says this , Chi erases
child is writing and whispering what she's writing
phone rings , MOT gets up to answer it and then comes right back
said a little more forceful the second time
aft in the background the oil man yells <all set>
aft the oil man says okay
